scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ECOS_ENV=test ts-mocha -p tsconfig.test.json -r source-map-support/register --extensions ts --watch --watch-files "src/**/*.ts" --watch-files "../noodl-ui/dist/index.js" "src/**/*.test.ts" --file src/setupTests.ts
scripts.test:file: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ECOS_ENV=test ts-mocha -p tsconfig.test.json -r source-map-support/register --file src/setupTests.ts --extensions ts --watch --watch-files "src/**/*.ts" --watch-files "../noodl-ui/dist/index.js"
